programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep9
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep135
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep83
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ep12
programme.desc: Helo para guru dan murid-murid sekolah rendah di seluruh Indonesia! Uji pengetahuan dan ketangkasan dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat dalam Juara Indonesia.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep1
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Gimana Caranya Jatuh Cinta Lagi
programme.desc: Sebuah kemalangan menyebabkan Ney kehilangan ingatannya dan melupakan momen-momen yang terjadi antara dirinya dan Farel. Ini mendorong Farel untuk berusaha keras agar Ney dapat mengingat kembali momen-momen tersebut dan jatuh cinta lagi dengan Farel.

programme.title: Jejak Rahasia Ep13
programme.desc: Febby, Dikta, dan Iril adalah tiga sahabat yang memiliki karakter yang berbeza tetapi mempunyai satu matlamat yang sama iaitu mencari kebenaran. Bersama-sama, mereka sentiasa berusaha menyelesaikan pelbagai masalah yang perlu dihadapi.

programme.title: Jatim Traveler Ep8
programme.desc: Jatim Traveler membawa anda mengembara menerokai keunikan kulinari, keindahan destinasi pelancongan, dan tradisi istimewa di serata pelosok Jawa Timur.

programme.title: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor Ep8
programme.desc: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor adalah sebuah dokumentari yang meneroka keindahan alam, landskap menawan, dan tradisi unik di Tanjung Selor, Kalimantan Utara.

programme.title: Lu Bijak Sama Gua Sekarang Neng Basreng
programme.desc: Jadual padat sebagai artis terkenal membuat Tama keletihan sehingga dia terlanggar seorang penjual basreng semasa memandu. Walaupun kesal, Aina dengan baik hati membawa Tama ke hospital. Setelah sedar, Tama terkejut mendapati dirinya berada di hospital bersama seorang wanita yang tidak dikenali. Bimbang insiden itu tersebar, Tama merayu kepada Aina agar tidak menceritakan kejadian tersebut. Tiba-tiba, wartawan datang bertanya tentang identiti Aina. Tanpa berfikir panjang, Tama secara spontan mengaku bahawa Aina adalah teman wanitanya.

programme.title: Mega Series Suara Hati Istri: Anjani Ep24

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: Steal My Heart
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep242
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep656
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep1016

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep48
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep49
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep21
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep49
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep343
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep344
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep656
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep1016
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep21

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep92
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep1016
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep1017
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep762
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep536
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep44
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughter-in-law wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Longs daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: The sequel to "Table for Six", Bernard and Lung plan to get married while their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for everyone involved.

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspects murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Laus investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2012
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-retired weather presenter Kwok Ching has always dream of becoming a news anchor. Being a single parent, he interferes in every aspect of his childrens lives, causing them to move away from him. When Kwok Ching receives a doomsday news and finally has the chance to become a news anchor, it is also time to reunite with his family.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Article 20
programme.desc: Han Ming, a prosecutor, faces a whirlwind of complications in his work and family lives: his son's clash with another student in school and his wife's intervention, as well as the strained partnerships at work. Amidst it all, a critical case challenges his sense of righteousness, and he decides to gamble everything to seek fairness and justice.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Lius disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tians rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tians granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld Kings sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Chehs epic The Water Margin, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword masters daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bats knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become The Five Shaolin Masters.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Lis wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Lis Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mothers death a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep99
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep100
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep26
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep27
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep17
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep18
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep27
programme.desc: A superhero child and his special car, Super Speedo, go on adventiures to save the world from villains.

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: Paap O Meter Ep19
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.title: Paap O Meter Ep20
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.desc: Secrets of Success - The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.title: Amazing Railway Adventures with Nick Knowles S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Romania - For his latest Railway Adventure Nick is in Romania, undertaking a journey he's dubbed 'The Transylvania Express'.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep4
programme.desc: In New South Wales, Australia, the worst bushfires in recent history attack multiple towns - overwhelming firefighters and trapping tourists at a lake front caravan park.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Smoker - Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Skip the runway with a 747 made over into a classy hotel, then inspect a malthouse that has been remodelled into a concert hall filled with beautiful music.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secrets of Success - The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.title: Wild City: Forest Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough narrates the award-winning Wild City series that explores the wild side of Singapore. Here on the fringes of the city, the jungle harbours some fascinating species, including many that have never been filmed before. The star of the show is the Raffles' banded langur, one of the least-known primates on the planet. Found only in Singapore and Malaysia, there are only a few hundred left and around 60 have made a home in Singapore's rainforests.

programme.title: North America with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Simon begins his most ambitious journey yet; travelling the entire length of the Americas. In this first leg, Simon travels from Alaska, down through Canada to Vancouver.

programme.desc: Romania - For his latest Railway Adventure Nick is in Romania, undertaking a journey he's dubbed 'The Transylvania Express'.

programme.title: Wild City: Secret World
programme.desc: Almost 30,000 species of animals make their home in Singapore, but many of them remain largely invisible to us. From banded bullfrogs that do battle in rain-sodden drains, to predatory mantises that hunt in suburban gardens, unseen drama unfold all around the city on a daily basis.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep8
programme.desc: Night Country - Alaskans soldier through the heart of dark winter in pursuit of the resources they desperately need for survival.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Rhythm of the Bay - The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North Americas largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it i

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Lifesavers - Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Partners - Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teachers pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazils Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Cloud to Coast - Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the islands forests.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Life on the Wing - Yala National Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 species of bird. This paradise offers many possibilities for parents who can weather the ever-changing climate. Every species must either raise their offspring here or find a new home before the dry season

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Lifesavers - Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk S1 Ep4
programme.desc: India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day - Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep5

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Horses of the Sun - Grvys zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we arent vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers

programme.title: Over Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arid Heart - From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australias most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Big Move - The Lilayi Elephant Nursery near Lusaka in Zambia is home to four orphan elephants. The two oldest, four-year- olds Musolole and Zambezi, have been here since they were just a few months old. These boisterous babies are out-growing the nursery and its time to move to big school. Two hundred miles away, in the heart of Kafue National Park, lies elephant heaven - Camp Phoenix, the projects release facility, where older orphans are already adapting to life in the wild.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Zambia's Peaceful Primates - Kasanka National Park in Zambia is home to an unusual species of baboon. Kinda baboons have turned their backs on the aggressive displays of dominance usually associated with these large monkeys and lead altogether more peaceful lives. Living alongside one troop is a dedicated team of researchers whose mission it is to uncover these baboons secrets and understand what makes them who they are.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Mating Game - Meet Madonna, a very special monkey. Shes the first Kinda baboon ever to be studied from birth to adulthood and now, critically, shes looking for a mate. Only recently identified as a species in their own right, Kinda baboons are little known and little understood. But Madonna is helping change all that. She may just hold the key to unlocking the secrets of the Kindas unique female-male relationships. These are baboons like no others.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Operation Rhino - Across Africa 97% of black rhinos have been killed for their horns. In 1997 the species was declared officially extinct in Zambia. But now, thanks to an ambitious reintroduction plan, theyre back. Poaching hasnt gone away their horns are still prized in Asian medicine. But a small, dedicated team are fighting to keep them safe. This is the frontline of conservation it doesnt get any tougher.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Chobe River - A mighty river snakes through wilderness in southern Africa. Its vast flood plains are a magnet for animals that, during the dry season, travel great distances to reach this oasis. But every animal has its place along the banks of the mighty Chobe.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Source to Sea - Follow a rivers epic quest to find the ocean, carrying water that has floated high over the mountains, quenched giant thirsts, and cut through rock, only to spill its nutrients into the warm and vibrant Indian Ocean and continue its endless cycle.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetland Wonder - South Africas greatest wetland, Lake St. Lucia, provides sustenance for animals that depend on standing water, including hippos, crocs, and countless water birds. But during a drought, the system faces challenges that have devastating consequences.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds funky mate-attracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs traffic-dodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons incredible uphill swimming skills.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Superpowers - Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs prey-detecting pressure sensors.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Villains - Meet natures most wanted and see why the baddest of the bad dont get the respect they deserve. Admire the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds funky mate-attracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs traffic-dodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons incredible uphill swimming skills.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Superpowers - Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs prey-detecting pressure sensors.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Villains - Meet natures most wanted and see why the baddest of the bad dont get the respect they deserve. Admire the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Savanna - The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether its head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Vanishing Wilderness - Kenya's growing human population is taking land and resources away from wildlife. The squeeze is creating increasing numbers of conflicts between humans and animals, and is one of the biggest issues in African conservation.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Penguins - At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. Its time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Untamed West - New Zealands West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels. To survive the conditions the wildlife here has to be hardy, cunning and resourceful. A journey along the West Coast reveals the beauty of this land, and the trials and tribulations of the wildlife that live here.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Fortresses - In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ocean Legacy - Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Geladas of Ethiopia - The gelada is a rare monkey that lives in the Simien Mountains of Ethiopia. Theyre charismatic, vocal, and mix affection and confrontation. Watch as they face the challenges of their habitatand each other.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Baboon Lagoon - Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continents most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Africa's Baboons - As humans take up more space, the baboons of Africa must adapt. Travel across the continent to watch them form unbreakable social bonds, serve to protect their families and survive a changing landscape.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Zanzibar's Poison Monkey - Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Rhythm of the Bay - The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North Americas largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere.The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep39
programme.desc: Chaser and Chewer: Part Flea / Sing For Your Pupper - Its another adventure with Tag and Scooch dressed up as their favorite comic book characters: Chaser and Chewer! But this time, bad guy Thunder (Frank) is asking for their help, because Flea (Beans) is trying to take over the town on his own. / When Tag and Scooch find out Wagnes has always dreamt of becoming a famous country music singer, they decide to make her dream come true.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep40
programme.desc: Dogcathalon - Mayor Sniffington mixed up the dates for the Dogcathalon and it turns out its being held today! Panicked, Tag and Scooch rush off to make sure the three race spots are race ready so they can be approved by the Top Dog. / The Dogcathalon Race has officially started! Tag goes into Crew Chief mode, running around to ensure Team Pawston is ready for each part of the race. But with Sam unable to race, he encourages Tag to take his place and win it all for Pawston.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep29
programme.desc: Dance Dance Resolution - After reuniting with his parents, King Julien doesn't want them to leave so he recreates a booty-shaking dance recital they had never seen.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren't Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep54
programme.desc: Not A Drill - The threat of monsters from the Netherworld portal has Puss running the townspeople through some crazy emergency drills, which no one takes seriously.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep2
programme.desc: Tacos / Rainy Day - When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep2
programme.desc: The Sleepover Save / The Very Hungry Vacuum - Marcus is having his first sleepover and Phoebe is concerned that Marcus may be nervous so Phoebe sets out to make sure he has the best first sleepover ever. / When Athenas magical jump rope gets sucked up by the familys new robot vacuum, she loses confidence in her abilities, only to learn that her real abilities are already inside her.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Bark / Slow, Dog. Slow! - When Tag and Scooch break Gilbers ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep18
programme.desc: Gem of a Different Color - Fishlegs finds a special gem, but a flock of dangerous Changewings want it back.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep19
programme.desc: We Are Family (Part 1) - Hiccup and Toothless search for other Night Furies.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep20
programme.desc: We Are Family (Part 2) - Hiccup and Toothless are kidnapped and must escape Outcast Island.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep70
programme.desc: One Tricked Pony - An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, Bridges Aflame. Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep71
programme.desc: Federal Slumber Party - Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, hes applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Babys cover at stake, its up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep38
programme.desc: The Master Key - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep3
programme.desc: Garage - The Dinotrux builds a garage where the Reptools can be safe, but D-Structs tries to thwart their efforts by pitting them against one another.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep4
programme.desc: Scraptors - Ty Rux leads the Dinotrux on a nighttime raid to rescue Ton-Ton who's been snatched by a pack of Scraptors and taken to their hive in Scraptor Valley.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep27
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Wally and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep28
programme.desc: Where's Woof? - When Woof disappears into the magic suitcase, Wally and Wenda launch an international search for their happily wandering puppy. Our favorite Wanderers from around the world return to help our heroes find Woof in this globetrotting adventure.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: The Banana Bread Burglar / Finding Meow Meow - When the banana bread Harper leaves out for Eden is stolen, the Dew Drops create a sting operation to catch the thief. / When Captain Meow Meow gets a splinter in his paw and hears the word "vet," he flees. Now it's up to the Dew Drops to find Captain Meow Meow and get that splinter out.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep3
programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep51
programme.desc: The Business Boss: Back in Baby - After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep52
programme.desc: The Stroll - Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep29
programme.desc: Ugly Duckling - As Puss readies a team to defend San Lorenzo, he's shocked to discover his mentor El Guante Blanco has taken on the Ugly Ducking as his newest protg.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep30
programme.desc: The Muscle - When traveling to recruit the mighty Golem for their mission, Puss tries to prove that no one is better than him at being "the muscle" of the team.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep13
programme.desc: Twinsanity - Hiccup and the gang struggle to uphold the traditions that keep the peace between Berk and the Beserkers.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep14
programme.desc: When Lightning Strikes - The Vikings of Berk suspect the dragons may be causing lightning storms in the village.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep30
programme.desc: 127 Owwws / 28 Fleas Later - Eep and Thunk become obsessed with a new trend known as quicktogramming/Grug accidentally causes the first outbreak of a super bug

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep31
programme.desc: To Squawk With Love / Lerk Was The Night - Eep & Thunk cheer up Squawk to avoid the first final exam/Eep and Lerk venture to the Garden of Eaten after the Broods spike the Watering Hole

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep55
programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep15
programme.desc: Board Silly / Sing for the Fences - Tag and Scooch play Scoochs favorite board game outside, using the whole town of Pawston as the board. \Tag thinks its time for an update to the Pawston City Anthem, which inspires a city-wide music competition where competitors will create and perform new Pawston anthems.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep11
programme.desc: Heather Report Part II - Hiccup and the gang infiltrate the outsiders in order to free Heathers parents.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep73
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tinas new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep74
programme.desc: Hate That Baby! - After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep75
programme.desc: North of the Border - With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But hes forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Bosss fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.
